item.title: Heres how to get rid of the flames
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“defyboy, post:10, topic:175376”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=235945.msg2074621#msg2074621 date=1203913038]

Silab, I would appreciate the credit for my work with the content grabber.
[/quote]haha wow, i used to think that you weren’t a total idiot… looks as though you proved me wrong

That was random, I thought I posted that in another thread. BTW, stfu frank.[/quote]
btw, cocks cocks cocks, nub cake

Read full topic

back on topic this is from 317 client

item.title: Heres how to get rid of the flames
item.dc:creator: @hieko hieko
item.description:
@hieko wrote:

It’s really simple.

open client.java

look for:
method58(25106);

and comment it out by changing it to

//method58(25106);

that will get rid of the flames on the login.

Read full topic
item.source: Heres how to get rid of the flames
